attributes.additional_details: I SHOULD LIKE THE BRITISH PUBLIC TO HAVE THE OPPORTUNITY TO VOTE IN A REFERENDUM ON OUR BEING PART OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITY.   WE WERE PROMISED ONE BY THE LABOUR ADMINISTRATION.   THE PRESENT CONSERVATIVE ADMINISTRATION PROMISED US A SAY IN OUR FUTURE IN THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITY BEFORE THE LAST GENERAL ELECTION,  BUT UP TO DATE WE, THE PUBLIC HAVE  NOT BEING GIVEN A VOICE IN OUR FUTURE MEMBERSHIP OF THE E.E.C
